definition: someone/people/anyone/there is someone there/occupied (as in restroom)
old man or woman/the elderly/one's aged parents or grandparents

sentences.chinese: 吉姆靠給人擦皮鞋爲生。

sentences.english: You’re probably one of those weirdos that doesn’t drink coffee in the morning either.
sentences.chinese: 而且你可能也是那種早晨不用喝咖啡的古怪人。

sentences.english: And fire raised man above all animals .
This gave the Chinese people a better sense of balance in regard to this-worldlincss and other- worldliness .
sentences.chinese: 這使得中國人對於入世和出世具有良好的平衡感。

sentences.english: A fire burns in the cauldron, as a reminder of the Olympic flame.
sentences.chinese: 火炬塔裏燃燒着一團火焰，讓人想到奧林匹克聖火。

sentences.english: Father Mabeuf was one of those persons for whom plants have souls.
sentences.chinese: 和某些人一樣，馬白夫公公也認爲植物是有靈魂的。

sentences.english: But as a local born and bred Liverpudlian person.
sentences.chinese: 但作爲一名土生土長的利物浦人。

sentences.english: anywhere you want to go,  there's always somebody friendly.
sentences.chinese: 無論你想去哪兒，都會有些友好的人。

sentences.english: All of them insisted on my staying with them a few days longer.
sentences.chinese: 他們所有的人都堅持要我再跟他們多呆幾天時間。

sentences.english: How long would it take to assemble a team for a project like this?
sentences.chinese: 爲這樣一個計劃調集一個小組的人需要多長時間？

sentences.english: It was the site of a British victory over the Saxons in571. Population, 74, 500.
sentences.chinese: 它是571年大不列顛人打敗撒克遜人的遺址。

sentences.english: Many people still cling to the old customs and beliefs.
sentences.chinese: 許多人仍然固守舊習慣和信仰。

sentences.english: Blair: Well, lucky for you, your friend is someone I actually care about.
sentences.chinese: 算你走運，你的那位朋友碰巧是我挺在乎的一個人。

sentences.english: When Bela died, Jobab son of Zerah from Bozrah succeeded him as king.
sentences.chinese: 比拉死了，波斯拉人謝拉的兒子約巴接續他作王。

sentences.english: If there are chaos in the society, your planning cannot precede them.
sentences.chinese: 人道沒有出現禍亂的時候，不可先策劃興師。

sentences.english: Someone you least expect could be trying to make you look bad.
sentences.chinese: 有人可能會想讓你出醜，這個人是你意想不到的。

definition: someone/people/anyone/there is someone there/occupied (as in restroom)
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
artificial/man-made/having human cause or origin/human attempt or effort
he or him/(used for either sex when the sex is unknown or unimportant)/(used before sb's name for emphasis)/(used as a meaningless mock object)/other/another
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
you (informal, as opposed to courteous 您[nin2])
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
